Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

I notice this only happens when I'm using the new Firefox on my 2nd monitor (not the default one).  When you click the Firefox tab the menus don't stay visible. 

I also noticed this, popup menus aren't visible like they should on 2nd monitor

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Bring Firefox on to a 2nd display monitor
2. Click "Firefox" button in the top-left corner (orange) also
3. Right click on the browser tab to view popup menu.
Actual Results:  
Menu appears and go away.

Expected Results:  
Menu should stay visible.
comments.creator: jmhwhite2001@hotmail.com
